queries.name: house price indices for Plymouth
queries.query: # Returns the house price indices for a particular local authoritySELECT DISTINCT ?regionName ?yearmonth ?indexr ?avgprice ?monthly ?annual ?volumeWHERE{  <http://landregistry.data.gov.uk/data/hpi/region/city-of-plymouth/month/2014-01>    lrhpi:refRegion ?region ;  lrhpi:indicesSASM ?indexSASM ;  lrhpi:refPeriod ?yearmonth ;  lrhpi:averagePricesSASM ?avgprice ;  lrhpi:monthlyChange ?monthly ;  lrhpi:annualChange ?annual.  ?region rdfs:label ?regionName.  OPTIONAL {    <http://landregistry.data.gov.uk/data/hpi/region/city-of-plymouth/month/2014-01>      lrhpi:salesVolume ?volume .  }  BIND (ROUND(xsd:decimal(?indexSASM) * 100)/100 AS ?indexr)}
